oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mayor Ben West and son Jay visit residents at the Knowles Home, 1961 December 23
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from a December 23rd, 1961 visit by Mayor Ben West and his son Jay West to the Knowles Home during the holiday season. The Knowles (Joseph B.) Memorial Home for Aged People was then located at 1501 23rd Avenue N and Ridley Road NW corner Hamilton. Mayor Ben West was in office as mayor of Nashville, Tennessee from 1951 to 1963. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974; West family
J.B. Knowles Home for the Aged (Nashville, Tenn.)
